name: Cube Snake VR
description:
Eat as much as you can! Be careful not to fall on the tail because you will die!

Controls:

  • Keyboard
    • Right Arrow - turn right
    • Left Arrow - turn left
    • Pasue - esc
  • Xbox 360 controler
    • Right Arrow - RB
    • Left Arrow - LB
    • Pause - start

Cubes description:

  • Green cubes - snake
  • Red cubes - fruits

Change log:

  • PreAlpha.0.06
    • Create "Change log"
    • Enable VR support (tested with Oculus Rift DK2 (SDK 0.8.0.0))
    • Add simple UI
    • Add new controler support (Xbox 360 controler)
    • Add pause
    • Changing cube color

Notes:

[2017-09-27] Some time has passed but I remember about the project and I have plans to add a few things:

  •  difficulty levels
  •  visual effects
  •  improvement of the acceleration method
